tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE candidate_screening ( 
    candidate_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    candidate_name VARCHAR(255), 
    screening_criteria JSONB, 
    screening_result BOOLEAN 
)

CREATE TABLE candidate_criteria (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_name VARCHAR(255),
  experience_years INT,
  skills VARCHAR(255),
  education_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE candidate_screening_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id INT,
  criteria_id INT,
  passed BOOLEAN,
  score DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Candidates (
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    candidate_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    candidate_phone VARCHAR(15),
    candidate_experience INT
);

CREATE TABLE Candidates (
	candidate_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	phone_number VARCHAR(20),
	experience_years INT,
	current_job_title VARCHAR(255),
	resume_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE InterviewFeedback (
	feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	candidate_id UUID REFERENCES Candidates(candidate_id),
	interviewer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL,
	overall_rating INT
);
